person.persName: Sidney S. McFatridge (Mercer County, KY, farmer & sheriff)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Married Sarah K. Kirby. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Mercer County in 1860. Sheriff of Mercer County from 1861 to 1862.
